title: The Diabolic
author: SJ Kincaid
description: A humanoid creature learns what it means to be human as she tries to save the empire and everyone she loves.

title: The Girl Who Could Fly
author: Victoria Forester
description: A young misfit learns she can fly...and that she is much stronger than she thinks she is.

title: The Song of Achilles
author: Madeline Miller
description: A retelling of the myth of Achilles. His tragic upbringing, his courage during the Trojan War, and his love that spanned life and death.

title: Lost Boy
author: Christina Henry
description: A cynical, hearbreaking take on the story of Peter Pan and the lost boys. A tale of friendship, ambition, and the cruelness of growing up.
